name: Chopper rescue
description:
Currently in development please wait until jam closes to play and review.

So far there is EASY Level 1, 2 and 3 (Highlands).

And SPECIAL Repair Zone  

I hope to have more levels shortly.

Made for one button game jam - Use the Space bar to play.

Works fine in full screen also.

Credits

Rico Searle: Game Design, Art, Programming, SFX and Music 

Collaborations - Fidel Delgado : the composer of "final zone" music track  (used on the level 3 of the Highlands section and also on the Credits Scene).

This was the first time I have worked with someone online and look forward to future team ups.

Extra feature on level selection screen "H" can be used to see global top number of rescues (from all players).
